creditline: Gift of Mrs C. C. Bovey
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rug, Navajo, red ground with design of horizontal bands carrying designs of deep zigzag stripes, a conventionalized floral vine, step-sided lozenges, and stepped pyramids in red, yellow, purple, green, orange, black and white; sides burttonholed in red yarn
title: Rug
